entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
